summary:
Enforce Memo for Ticket Creation Walkthrough
- Backend validation added in `store/ticket.go`.
- Frontend validation added in `web/src/pages/Tickets.tsx` with improved error reporting.
- Tests updated in `store/test/ticket_test.go`.

Implement Mention Notifications Walkthrough
- Backend: `server/router/api/v1/memo_service.go` now parses mentions and sends notifications.
- Frontend: `web/src/components/Inbox/MemoCommentMessage.tsx` redirects mentions to Ticket View.
